channel.title: I need help with 3 problems
channel.description:
1.) I need help to add an auto retaliate to my server. 2.) How do i remove shops from the quest tab. 3.) My client has a lot of items not accounted for like they are showing up as dots. [hr] 1.)
I need help with adding an auto re-taliate, i really need it. [hr] 2.) How do i remove shops from my quest tab. Look.
[IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/fypxzr.jpg[/img] [hr] I need to fix all these items.
Like
Skill capes, hoods, godswords and stuff they all come up like that. All of the new items like bandos, armadyl, skillcapes, skill hoods, anything with 5 numers and some other items [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/2njjxwn.png[/img]

2.) How do i remove shops from the quest tab.
3.) My client has a lot of items not accounted for like they are showing up as dots.
